div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1022 Kobuleti environs, Adzhar ASSR, Georgia, 1948 Burial: c. 350-345 B.C. Contents: 160+ AR. Pot hoard Colchis: 58 hemidr. (4 with ΜΟ) Sinope: 102 dr. (as RGA I.1, pl. 25, 13-21 [14 basic varieties]) Disposition: Tiflis II; Batumi (Adzhar State Mus.) 149 Golenko, SA 1957, pp. 290-8; † VDI 1961, no. 1, pp. 42-59
